actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 406 of the General Education Provisions Act to incorporate the National Center for Education Statistics into the process of collection of statistics in the field of vocational education.

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to incorporate the National Center for Education Statistics into the process of the collection of statistics in the field of vocational education.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 406 of the General Education Provisions Act to incorporate the National Center for Education Statistics into the process of collection of statistics in the field of vocational education.
